pr_title: Fix error creating unnecessary data channel for user timer in py sdk

timeline.message: Fix error creating unncessary data channel for user timer in py sdk

timeline.bodyText: Is it possible for timer_api_service_descriptor to be None as well?
timeline.author: aaltay
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -819,7 +819,7 @@ def __init__(self,
     # There is no guarantee that the runner only set
     # timer_api_service_descriptor when having timers. So this field cannot be
     # used as an indicator of timers.
-    if self.process_bundle_descriptor.timer_api_service_descriptor:
+    if self.process_bundle_descriptor.timer_api_service_descriptor.url:

replies.bodyText: I believe for proto3 all fields are optional and have a default instance thus can't be None.
replies.author: y1chi
